29a1(nyi khri): 'drung 'jos ses su mi byed/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas rlom sems su mi dong // rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rlon sems su mi byed nA/ de zi lam
29a2(nyi khri): cho sems su ni byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// sprul pa'i bar du chom sems su mi byed / sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la/ 
29a3(nyi khri): rlon sems su mi byed do// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rlom sems su mi byed/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
29a4(nyi khri): sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rlom sems su mi byed/ byang chub kyi phyigs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la rlom semasu mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi la mo gyis rlom
29a5(nyi khri): sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas/ rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed
29a6(nyi khri): do 'phag pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar brgyad dang / 
29a7(nyi khri): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams rlom sems su mi byed/ mngon
29a8(nyi khri): par shes pa rnams kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mngon par shes pa rnams la rlom sems su mi byed na/ dermi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi
29b1(nyi khri): lam la rjom sems su mi byed do// sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi/ 
29b2(nyi khri): sgo rnams rlom sems su mi byed do// gzungs kyis sgo rnams rlom sems su mi byed/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis
29b3(nyi khri): rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi bye// 
29b4(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs
29b5(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rlom sems su mi byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rlom sa// mas su mi byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
29b6(nyi khri): la rlom semasu mi byed na/ de ni rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sem sa su mi byed do// sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi
29b7(nyi khri): byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed// rnam pa pa babyin pa nyid kyis rlob pa ma byed/ rnam pa banas ca
29b8(nyi khri): kyi kyi sa byed / de rmi la ma rlom sems su mi byed/ rmilam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed // sprul pa'i bar du rom sems su mi rtse
30a1(nyi khri): sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di/ 
30a2(nyi khri): nang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phral dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs
30a3(nyi khri): g+ha nye ngan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi bye mas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par
30a4(nyi khri): mthor zhing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lha gas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 
30a5(nyi khri): de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po rgya byin dang // / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / gnas gaHnga ma'i ris kyi bar gyis lha rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi
30a6(nyi khri): mthus shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyi chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
30a7(nyi khri): zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de nas lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid nu zhing / yongs su dri ba sems kyis/ 
30a8(nyi khri): mthong bar gyur to// lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nu pa dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs re re zhing sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos
30b1(nyi khri): stong pang mtshan nyid 'di nyid mnga' sa/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang mo'ang nyid dang / shA rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i le'u 'di cing nub dang / 
30b2(nyi khri): na d+ha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi la ror tu phyin pa'i lo'u 'di nying bu zhing / yongasu dring sems kyis mthong bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di/ 
30b3(nyi khri): skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub se seng la chen pa byams pa yang sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du/ blan meng pa yang dgu par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
30b4(nyi khri): sangs rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing / 'chang bar 'gyur ro// gang yang bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
30b5(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba de dag kyang sa'i phyor// sa 'di nyid du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ shes rab
30b6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang dang / rtags gang dang / mtshan ma gang gis byang chub sems
30b7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur/ de skad
30b8(nyi khri): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'di la rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na
31a1(nyi khri): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 
31a2(nyi khri): gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ gzugs sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par
31a3(nyi khri): mi 'gyur ro/ pa gzugs zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 
31a4(nyi khri): gzugs 'das shes bya ba'am/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba 'am da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/  // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam
31a5(nyi khri): par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar cho/ sa ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ rnam par
31a6(nyi khri): shes pa bdag ces bya ba'am/ ba dang / med ces bya ba 'am/ rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba
31a7(nyi khri): 'am ma ni zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa 'das shes bya
31a8(nyi khri): ba'am nga ma 'ongs zhes bya ba'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces
31b1(nyi khri): bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces byang/ 
31b2(nyi khri): 'amang rten cing 'brel par 'byung bsdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos sbyin par mi 'gyur ro// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni zhes bya ba'ag mazhi zhes bya bar chas ston pa
31b3(nyi khri): mi 'gyur ro// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung nga bcings shes bya ba'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'das shes bya ba'am/ ma 'ongs shes bya ba'am/ 
31b4(nyi khri): bar byung shes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cadad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chas sum bcu rtsa bdun pas
31b5(nyi khri): ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya ba'am/ byang chub kyi phyog/ sa kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 
31b6(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun ki zhes bya ba'am/ ma ni zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyuraro// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu du bdun bcings zhes bya ba'ang/ grol zhes pa/ 
31b7(nyi khri): bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun 'das zhes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyu ro// 'phags pa'i
31b8(nyi khri): bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
31b9(nyi khri): byang chub kyi bya kyi chos sum bcu rgya 'dun rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya'am/ byang chub kyi byon kyi chos sum bcu ma 'dun pa de zhes bya ba'ang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/ 
32a1(nyi khri): / 'jug pa dgu dang / stong nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba chos ston par mi 'gyuraro// mngon par shes pa
32a2(nyi khri): rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar
32a3(nyi khri): chos ston par mi 'gyuraro// mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyu ro// mngon par shes pa rnams bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par
32a4(nyi khri): mi 'gyu ro// mngon par shes pa rnams 'das zhes bya ba 'am/ dam 'ongs shes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ste ngan par mi 'gyuraro// ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams
32a5(nyi khri): rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyuraro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug sngal ni sa bya ba'am/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdas
32a6(nyi khri): med ces bya ba 'am/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces par chos ston par mi 'gyuraro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bya ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyu ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams
32a7(nyi khri): bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes par chos ston par mi 'gyu ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'das shes bya ba'am/ ma 'ongs shes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyu ro// de bzhin gash+ye
32a8(nyi khri): pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jig pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 
32b1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dnge zhes pa'am/ sdug sngal zhes bya ba 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya ba'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
32b2(nyi khri): pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyu ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
32b3(nyi khri): pa rnams bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'das shes bya ba'am/ ma 'ongs shes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos
32b4(nyi khri): ston par mi 'gyuraro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyuraro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ 
32b5(nyi khri): sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces
32b6(nyi khri): bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyu ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba 'am// ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar
32b7(nyi khri): chos ston par mi 'gyuraro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'das shes bya ba'am/ ma 'ongs shes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyuraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang
32b8(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dngapa'achen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos ni ji ltar ston par 'gyur/ ston ni ci zhig ston par 'gyur/ 
33a1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs shin du rnam par dag go zhes/ shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
33a2(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa shin du rnam par dag go zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shin du rnam par
33a3(nyi khri): dag go zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyuraro// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun shin du rnam par
33a4(nyi khri): ngag go zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur// / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rna mas dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyom/ 
33a5(nyi khri): par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang // 
33a6(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa rnams shin du rnam par dag go zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyuraro// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams shin du rnam par dag go zhes shin du rnam par
33a7(nyi khri): dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams shin du
33a8(nyi khri): rnam par dag go zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyuraro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin du rnam par dag go zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyu ro// gsol
33b1(nyi khri): babacod ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yong su dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag
33b2(nyi khri): pa'ong tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par
33b3(nyi khri): 'dung ba yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su
33b4(nyi khri): dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu dag pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par
33b5(nyi khri): thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan na med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su dag pa'i
33b6(nyi khri): phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// 
33b7(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
33b8(nyi khri): yongs su dag pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs
34a1(nyi khri): yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su
34a2(nyi khri): dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol
34a3(nyi khri): tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes
34a4(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / chang med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 
34a5(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyom sa par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan mamed pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa
34a6(nyi khri): yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
34a7(nyi khri): byin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongasasu
34a8(nyi khri): dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu dag
34b1(nyi khri): pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor gzugs la skyeng med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzugs yongs su
34b2(nyi khri): dag pa'o nga tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni/ rnam par shes/ 
34b3(nyi khri): bar yongasu dag pa'o// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni/ rten
34b4(nyi khri): cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongasu dag pa'o// pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / drang ba kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la skyed med pa dang / 'gam
34b5(nyi khri): pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par/ khyad pa med pa ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su dag pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa
34b6(nyi khri): rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
34b7(nyi khri): 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gagang med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa mang ba dang / 
34b8(nyi khri): rnam par byang ba med pa ni/ mngon par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 
35a1(nyi khri): rnam par byang ba med pa ni/ gzungs kyi sgo yongs su dag pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
35a2(nyi khri): rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa so brgyad la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
35a3(nyi khri): ba bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'o// rnam pa thams cad khyen pa nyid kyi bar la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni/ 
35a4(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang na mkha' yongasu dag pa / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// / 
35a5(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na mkha' yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin yod su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ 
35a6(nyi khri): parnga rab 'byor skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ namakha' yongs su dag pa ste/ rab 'byor na mkha' la 'gro
35a7(nyi khri): ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
35a8(nyi khri): nga yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor na mkha' la gzung du med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu dag pa'o// 
35b1(nyi khri): rab 'byor na mkha' la tha snyad med pa'i phyi/ shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na na mkha' la tha snyad ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha
35b2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha' sgra brnyan gnyis kyi sgra ltar na mkha' tha snyad med pa'i phyir/ shes
35b3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa'o// rab 'byor na mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nan mkha'
35b4(nyi khri): brjod du ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor na mkha' la ni gang yang brjod med do// / 
35b5(nyi khri): rab 'byor de bzhin du na mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir/ shes ra/ ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa'o// rab 'byor/ gzhan yang na mkha' dmig su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab
35b6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na na mkha' dmigasu ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa lags/ bcom
35b7(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor na mkha' la gang yang dmig su med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du na mkha' dmigasu med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa'i/ 
35b8(nyi khri): rab 'byor gzhan yang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag
36a1(nyi khri): pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / 
36a2(nyi khri): rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad shin tu rnam par
36a3(nyi khri): dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu dag pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
36a4(nyi khri): phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de la mig gi nad 'byung ba mi 'gyu ro// rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i
36a5(nyi khri): nad dang / lce'i nad dang / yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro// lu/ sa ngan par mi 'gyu ro// rgas pas khogs pa'i lusu mi 'gyu ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni/ mi bde
36a6(nyi khri): ba mi spongs pas dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// de'i slad bzhin du lha brgya stong phrag mang po 'brang bar 'gyur te/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams
36a7(nyi khri): kyang slad du 'brang bar 'gyu ro// gang na chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa der yang / tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la lha/ 
36a8(nyi khri): tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa'i tshe/ bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
36b1(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu mang ba/ tshad ma mchis pa/ grangs ma mchis pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa ma mchis pa/ gzhal du ma mchis pa dang / dpag tu
36b2(nyi khri): ma mchis pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dang ba
36b3(nyi khri): bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel te/ bsod nams kyi phung / 
36b4(nyi khri): po mang ba/ tshad med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ dpag tu me dad pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyuraro// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
36b5(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che'o// rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po cha ni 'di yin te/ sems can dmyal ba las yongasu grol
36b6(nyi khri): pabar byed pa'o// byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi dang lha dbul po las yongasu grol bar byed pa'o// rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o// bram ze'i
36b7(nyi khri): rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o// khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye
36b8(nyi khri): mched kyi bar gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o// dgra
37a1(nyi khri): bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub 'byin pa'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ 
37a2(nyi khri): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgyas par bstan te/ de la brlabs pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing / 
37a3(nyi khri): mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod// 
37a4(nyi khri): tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge
37a5(nyi khri): dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chungache dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che/ ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang
37a6(nyi khri): ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du she
37a7(nyi khri): med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub
37a8(nyi khri): yod do// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yod na/ bsam gtan bzhi yod do// tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
37b1(nyi khri): par 'jug pa bzhi yod do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
37b2(nyi khri): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
37b3(nyi khri): bar du yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / 
37b4(nyi khri): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting 'dzin thams cad dang / gzugs kyi sku
37b5(nyi khri): thams cad yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par ri/ ga pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / 
37b6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod do// de yang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan
37b7(nyi khri): te/ de la bslabs na/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
37b8(nyi khri): kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor
38a1(nyi khri): dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / 
38a2(nyi khri): chung che dang / tshad med che dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
38a3(nyi khri): dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir
38a4(nyi khri): 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub se/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin
38a5(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya sa rnams yod do// de bas na de ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che zhes bya'o// pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che de la ni// 
38a6(nyi khri): chos gang yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ yongs su bzung ba 'am/ dor ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa
38a7(nyi khri): 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ yongasu bzung ba 'am/ dor bar bya ba'i chos de lta bu med do// rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni/ dge ba 'am/ mi dge
38a8(nyi khri): paba'am/ 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa med pa 'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmig su med de/ 
38b1(nyi khri): rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni dmigs su med do// rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che la ni/ chos gang gis kyang 'gro ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
38b2(nyi khri): ltar gang 'go bar 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu dmigs su med do// rab 'byor de'i phyir na/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'gro ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che'o// rab 'byor gal te/ byang
38b3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar 'du shes par yang mi byed la/ de ltar mi rtog cing / de ltar mi dmigs te/ de ltar 'phro bar
38b4(nyi khri): yang mi byed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o// de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed
38b5(nyi khri): pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon par bsams shing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gro bya ba dang / bskur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / 
38b6(nyi khri): mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu sbyang bar byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing
38b7(nyi khri): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang yang ston pa'am/ rnam par ston pa 'am/ yongasu ston pa 'am/ 'dzin par byed pa 'am/ 'byin
38b8(nyi khri): bar byed pa 'am/ skye bar byed pa 'am/ 'gag par byed pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar byed pa 'am/ 'grib par byed pa 'am/ 'phel bar byed pa 'am/ 'das pa 'am/ 
39a1(nyi khri): ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung bar byed pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'dod pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par
39a2(nyi khri): byed pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin// 
39a3(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu byon pa dang / 
39a4(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ dngos po
39a5(nyi khri): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgrub pa ma yin// 'dor ba ma yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin// 
39a6(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms por 'jug pa rnams bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin// 
39a7(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams bsgrub pa ma yin// 
39a8(nyi khri): 'dor ba ma yin/ ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so
39b1(nyi khri): yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
39b2(nyi khri): bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rang byang chub bsgrub/ 
39b3(nyi khri): pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin no// / 
39b4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa// bam po zhi gcig pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor ba ma yin/ 'dus
39b5(nyi khri): ma byas kyi khams bsgrub pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung / chos rnams kyi
39b6(nyi khri): chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa de ni de bzhin du gnas pa yin te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par sangs rgyas so// mngon par
39b7(nyi khri): thugs su chud do// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mngon par rdzogs par thugasu chud nas kyang gsung ngo // ston to// brjod do// 'grel to// rnam par 'byed do// yang dag gsal bar/ 
39b8(nyi khri): mdzad do// yang dag par ston to// de nas lha'i bu stong phrag mang po steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/ lhung lhung ldegs kyi sgra phyung ste/ lha rdzas kyi me tog ud pa la dang / pad mo dang / 
40a1(nyi khri): ku mu ta dang / pun da ri ka dang / man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po 'thor zhing / 'di skad kyi tshig brjod par gyur to// kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
40a2(nyi khri): 'di bstan pas/ lha'i bu stong phrag du ma skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa skyes par gyur te/ 'dzam+bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor ba mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 
40a3(nyi khri): gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bskor ba yang ma yin/ gcig tu bskor ba yang ma
40a4(nyi khri): yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang chos gang de la yang 'khor ba 'am/ mi 'khor bar bya ba'i phyir/ da nye bar gnas pa ma yino// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
40a5(nyi khri): de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang yanga'akhor bar bgyi ba 'am/ mi khor bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ nye bar mi gnas pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
40a6(nyi khri): pa nyid de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
40a7(nyi khri): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas steng ngo // nang
40a8(nyi khri): stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar
40b1(nyi khri): gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo // yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags
40b2(nyi khri): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs
40b3(nyi khri): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
40b4(nyi khri): dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo // ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ngo // de bzhin gshegs
40b5(nyi khri): pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen/ bo dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
40b6(nyi khri): pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo // rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo // lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong
40b7(nyi khri): ba'i 'bras bu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo // dgra bcom pa nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rang byang chub rang byang chub kyis stong ngo // lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi
40b8(nyi khri): rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
41a1(nyi khri): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chen mo ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o// de ni chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis
41a2(nyi khri): stong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
41a3(nyi khri): rgya yang chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis/ chos kyi 'khor lo yang bskor la/ chos gang yang 'khor ba 'am/ mi 'khor ba 'am/ rab tu 'khor bar bgyid pa ma mchis te/ 
41a4(nyi khri): de dag gis chos gang yang yongasu mthong ba 'am/ yongasu ma mthong ba ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ da ni 'di ltar gang 'khor bar bgyi ba 'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyi ba 'am/ rab tu
41a5(nyi khri): 'khor bar bgyi ba'i chos de lta bu dmigasu ma mchis te/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad kyang shin tu mngon par ma grub pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ stong pa nyid ni 'khor bar
41a6(nyi khri): bgyid pa 'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so// mtshan ma mchis pa ni/ 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lagaso// smon pa ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa'am/ 
41a7(nyi khri): mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so// de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang / rab tu bstan pa dang bsgrags pa dang / rab tu dgod pa dang / gzhag pa dang / rnam par dbye ba
41a8(nyi khri): dang rnam par grol ba dang / smos pa dang / gsal bar bgyi ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan
41b1(nyi khri): pa de yang sus kyang ma bstan/ sus kyang ma bzung ngo // gang sus kyang ma bstan/ gang sus kyang ma bzung ba de ni/ sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis so// gang sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis pa de ni// 
41b2(nyi khri): yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba ma mchis te/ chos bstan pa 'di la gang su yang sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba ma mchis so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las
41b3(nyi khri): le'u nyi shu brgyad pa'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
41b4(nyi khri): papha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ na mkha' med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
41b5(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi pa// rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad mnya pa nyid kyi phyir// 
41b6(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par dben pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor mtha'
41b7(nyi khri): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rol kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thub pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
41b8(nyi khri): stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gnas ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom
42a1(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ming dang lus med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ nam mkha'i pha
42a2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba med pa'i phyir ro// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni// 
42a3(nyi khri): brjod du ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par spyod pa dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
42a4(nyi khri): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ ming ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes
42a5(nyi khri): dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dmig su med ba'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'gro ba ma
42a6(nyi khri): mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
42a7(nyi khri): tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mi 'phrogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
42a8(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skad cig pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad byang shing zad pa'i phyi ro// gsol pa/ 
42b1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ skye ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad skye ba dang / 
42b2(nyi khri): 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byed pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
42b3(nyi khri): stsal pa/ byed pa po dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ shes pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom
42b4(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes pa po dmigasu me dad pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'pho ba ma mchis pa'i
42b5(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skye ba dang 'chi ba dmig su med pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
42b6(nyi khri): phyin pa 'di ni/ 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
42b7(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rmi lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rmi lam mthong ba dmigasu med pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
42b8(nyi khri): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ sgra brnyan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan pa dang / sgrar brjod pa dmigasu med pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ 
43a1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mig yor gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ me long
43a2(nyi khri): bzhin dmig su med pa'i phyir// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ smig rgyu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ 
43a3(nyi khri): pa/ chu 'bab pa dmigasu med pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ sgyu ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
43a4(nyi khri): stsal pa/ mtshan ma dmigasu med pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha ro// la tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu
43a5(nyi khri): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ma rig pa'i ru na pa dmigasu med pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 
43a6(nyi khri): kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dmigasu med pa'i phyi ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
43a7(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro// / 
43a8(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ dmigasu ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas
43b1(nyi khri): dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ spros pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 
43b2(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rlom sems ma mchis
43b3(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
43b4(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mi g.yo ba'i pha rol tu phyin dpa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyi ro// gsol pa/ bcom
43b5(nyi khri): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di/ ni/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i pha rol tu phyin/ ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos
43b6(nyi khri): thams cad ma nor ba yang dag pa nyid du mngon par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa'i phyir// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ kun nas ldang ba
43b7(nyi khri): ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
43b8(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med cing / dmigasu med pa'i phyiraro// gsol
44a1(nyi khri): pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'dod chags ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
44a2(nyi khri): 'dod chags dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ zhe sdang ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
44a3(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhe sdang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ gti mug ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom
44a4(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi shes pa'i mun pa tham sa cad sel ba'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ nyon mongs
44a5(nyi khri): pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu byin pa'o// bcom ldan 'ad/ sa kyis bka' stsal pa/ yongs su rtog pa med pa'i phyir// ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
44a6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ sems can ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can med pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
44a7(nyi khri): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rab tu spang ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kun nas sdang ba med pa'i phyi ro// gsol/ 
44a8(nyi khri): pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mtha' gnyisu mi 'gyur ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' rnam par spong
44b1(nyi khri): ba'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ tha mi dad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams/ 
44b2(nyi khri): cad 'dres pa med pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ nyams pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
44b3(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar byed pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rnam par rtog pa
44b4(nyi khri): ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dmi/ dag su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
44b5(nyi khri): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ tshad ma mchi sa pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi tshad dmigasu med
44b6(nyi khri): pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ na mkha'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos
44b7(nyi khri): thams cad la chags pa med pa'i phyi ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mi rtag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra
44b8(nyi khri): stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ sdug bsngal gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan
45a1(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad tshol ba sbyor ba med pa'i phyir// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 
45a2(nyi khri): bdag ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa med pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
45a3(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmig su med pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom
45a4(nyi khri): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad
45a5(nyi khri): mngon par bsgrub pa med pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom
45a6(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang gi chos dmig su med pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu
45a7(nyi khri): phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi'i chos dmigasu med pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ phyi nang
45a8(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi nang gi chos dmigasu med pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
45b1(nyi khri): byin pa 'di ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigasu med pa'i phyi ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
45b2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chen po stong pa nyid dmigasu med pa'i phyir// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
45b3(nyi khri): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigasu med pa'i
45b4(nyi khri): phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
45b5(nyi khri): stsal pa/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigasu med pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes ra kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi pha
45b6(nyi khri): rol tu byin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigasu med pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
45b7(nyi khri): ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigasu med pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
45b8(nyi khri): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ thog ma dang / tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
46a1(nyi khri): pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
46a2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigasu med pa'i phyir// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rang bzhin
46a3(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos dmigasu med pa'i phyi ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
46a4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi nang gi chos dmigasu med pa'i phyiraro// / 
46a5(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha/ rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
46a6(nyi khri): pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
46a7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ dngos po med
46a8(nyi khri): pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i chos nyid kyi phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
46b1(nyi khri): pa 'di ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid dben pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
46b2(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ dngos po med pa'i de bo nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigasu med pa'i
46b3(nyi khri): phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus
46b4(nyi khri): dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang chos dmig su med pa'i phyiro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes darab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ yang dag par spong ba'i pha
46b5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos dmigasu med pa'i phyir// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
46b6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dmigasu med pa'i phyi ro// gsol pa/ bcom
46b7(nyi khri): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ dbang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbang po lnga dmig su med pa'i phyiraro// gsol
46b8(nyi khri): pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs lnga dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// 
47a1(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
47a2(nyi khri): stsal pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigasu med pa'i phyir// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
47a3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmig su med pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
47a4(nyi khri): 'di ni/ stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom lda na 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / rnam par dben pa'i rnam pa dmig su med pa'i phyir/ 
47a5(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mtshan ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu byin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i
47a6(nyi khri): rnam pa dmig su med pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ smon pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
47a7(nyi khri): stsal pa/ smon pa dmigasu med pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom
47a8(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigasu med pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mthar gyis
47b1(nyi khri): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigasu med pa'i phyir// gsol
47b2(nyi khri): pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin pa dang / ser sna dmigasu med// 
47b3(nyi khri): pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshul
47b4(nyi khri): khrims dang / tshul khrims ngan pa dmig su med pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
47b5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnod sems/ dang / bzod pa dmig su med pa'i phyir// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
47b6(nyi khri): pa 'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ le lo dang / brtson 'grus dmigasu med pa'i phyi ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
47b7(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bsam gtan dang 'khrug pa dmigasu med pa'i phyiraro// gsol
47b8(nyi khri): pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes rab dang / 'chal pa'i shes
48a1(nyi khri): rab dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ stobs bcu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan
48a2(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad thub pa med pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mi 'jigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin
48a3(nyi khri): ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes zhum pa med pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 'di
48a4(nyi khri): ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa med pa dang / thogs pa med
48a5(nyi khri): ba'i phyir// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ snying rje chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
48a6(nyi khri): sems can thams cad yongasu mi gtong ba'i phyir// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi pha rol
48a7(nyi khri): tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
48a8(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ brjod pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi phyir// gsol pa/ 
48b1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rang byung gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i
48b2(nyi khri): phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos/ 
48b3(nyi khri): thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyiro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u nyi shu dgu pa'o// / 
48b4(nyi khri): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du gyur te/ shes darab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni// 
48b5(nyi khri): sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa'o// shes rab tu pha rol tu phyin pa 'di/ sems can gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa
48b6(nyi khri): ba bskyed pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di/ sems can gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu bzung ba'o// gang 'dzin pa dang / 
48b7(nyi khri): 'chang ba dang / klog cing / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / bzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / bklag pa dang / kun chub par byas nas kyang de bzhin nyid du
48b8(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byed pa lta ci smos te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas/ mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par
49a1(nyi khri): mi 'gyur ba de dag gis/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yongasu dris so// yongasu zhus so// rigs kyi
49a2(nyi khri): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas/ mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur la/ 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa
49a3(nyi khri): dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gis ni bskal pa bye ba mang por sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan
49a4(nyi khri): dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do snyam pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom da ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
49a5(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ mi 'jigs mi dang nga skrag par mi 'gyur la/ 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing
49a6(nyi khri): kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang 'dra bar gzung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du/ 
49a7(nyi khri): zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa ste/ sngon pha rol tu phyin pa drug la ma spyad pas ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang // 
49a8(nyi khri): mos par bgyi bar mi nus so// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas spangs par sems pa de dag gis ni/ sngon
49b1(nyi khri): gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spangs par gyur to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
49b2(nyi khri): zab mo 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ dad pa dang / mas pa ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sngun gyi mthar yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / 
49b3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos rnams la bsnyen bkur ma bgyis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha
49b4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ 
49b5(nyi khri): ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ nang stong pa nyid ji ltar bsgom/ bar bgyi/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
49b6(nyi khri): rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
49b7(nyi khri): dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs
49b8(nyi khri): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
50a1(nyi khri): pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
50a2(nyi khri): stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi zhes yongasu ma zhus yongasu ma
50a3(nyi khri): dris so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shin tu zab na/ 
50a4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/  sngon ma spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mos par mi 'gyur ba lta ngo mtshar kyang ci che/ sbyin
50a5(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu bya na pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
50a6(nyi khri): phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / byang chub kyi phyogs
50a7(nyi khri): kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar/ 
50a8(nyi khri): pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting 'dzin rnams dang / 
50b1(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam
50b2(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mos par mi 'gyur ba lta ngo mtshar kyang ci che/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// gang shes rab kyi pha rol
50b3(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// ko'u
50b4(nyi khri): shi ka de de bzhin te/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dal phyag 'tshal ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di
50b5(nyi khri): las byung ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes las ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
50b6(nyi khri): tu phyin brjod do// ko'u shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes nyid la gnas par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o// 
50b7(nyi khri): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes bsgrub par 'dod pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar 'dod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'dod
50b8(nyi khri): pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// sems can rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong
51a1(nyi khri): ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par 'dod pa dang / rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa dang / bla na med pa yang
51a2(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa'i rig kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// sems can rnams 'tshang rgya ba nyid la dgod
51a3(nyi khri): par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// khams gsum gyi phul du 'gyur bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos
51a4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// bdud thams cad pham par bya bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am// rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa la
51a5(nyi khri): brtson par bya'o// dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// de skad ces bka'
51a6(nyi khri): stsal ba dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
51a7(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi
51a8(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
51b1(nyi khri): spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
51b2(nyi khri): pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na nang stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na dngos
51b3(nyi khri): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na 'phags pa'i
51b4(nyi khri): bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med/ de pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug/ pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar
51b5(nyi khri): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ 
51b6(nyi khri): ji ltar na ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par
51b7(nyi khri): rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u
51b8(nyi khri): shi ka de ltar khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di yongasu 'dri bar sems pa legaso legs so// ko'u shi ka khyod kyi spobs pa 'di
52a1(nyi khri): yang sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis byung ngo // ko'u shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
52a2(nyi khri): gzugs la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzugs la brtson par byed pa yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mi
52a3(nyi khri): gnas te/ gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed pa yin no// mig la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe mig la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ mig
52a4(nyi khri): la brtson par byed pa yin no// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la mi gnas te/ gang gi cha yid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ yid la brtson par byed pa yin no// 
52a5(nyi khri): gzugs la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzugs la brtson par byed pa yin// sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang reg dang / chos la mi gnas te/ 
52a6(nyi khri): gang gi tshe chos la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ chos la brtson par byed pa yin no// mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi gnas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis/ 
52a7(nyi khri): tshor ba la mi gnas/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi gnas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la ma
52a8(nyi khri): gnas te/ gang gi tshe yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la brtson par byed pa yin no// sa'i khams la mi gnas te/ 
52b1(nyi khri): gang gi tshe sa'i khams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ sa'i khams la brtson par byed pa yin no// chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / na mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes
52b2(nyi khri): pa'i khams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la brtson par byed pa yin no// ma rig pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe// 
52b3(nyi khri): ma rig pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ ma rig pa la brtson par byed pa yin no// 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tsher
52b4(nyi khri): ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dadang / rga shi la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rga shi la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rga shi la brtson par byed pa yin no// sbyin
52b5(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe sbyinapa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ sbyin par pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed pa yin no// tshul khrims
52b6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas te/ 
52b7(nyi khri): gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed pa yin no// nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe nang stong pa nyid
52b8(nyi khri): la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la/ 
53a1(nyi khri): mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe dran pa nye bar
53a2(nyi khri): gzhag pa rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / 
53a3(nyi khri): stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ 'phags
53a4(nyi khri): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtson par byed pa yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnam ngas dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
53a5(nyi khri): par 'jug pa rnams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtson par
53a6(nyi khri): byed pa yin no// rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshon ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams
53a7(nyi khri): la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no// tingange 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi
53a8(nyi khri): gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / 
53b1(nyi khri): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
53b2(nyi khri): pa bco brgyad la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson par byed pa yin no// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / 
53b3(nyi khri): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rang byang chub la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rang byang chub la brtson par byed pa yin no// 
53b4(nyi khri): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad ma na pa nyid la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rnam pa thams/ cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
53b5(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i gzugs
53b6(nyi khri): mi dmigs so// gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigaso// gang la gnas par
53b7(nyi khri): bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi dmigaso// gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i pha
53b8(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi dmigs so// gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i
54a1(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar
54a2(nyi khri): pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs so// 
54a3(nyi khri): tingange 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigaso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa
54a4(nyi khri): chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dam 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigaso// rgyun tu zhugs rapa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
54a5(nyi khri): dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub mi dmigs so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
54a6(nyi khri): mi dmig so// kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe
54a7(nyi khri): gzugs la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ gzugs la brtson par byed pa yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ 
54a8(nyi khri): gang gi tshe rnam por shes pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed pa yino// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mi
