163a3(nyi khri): na bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par
163a4(nyi khri): rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i pha da rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so// 
163a5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdu na dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam
163a6(nyi khri): gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
163a7(nyi khri): 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs
163a8(nyi khri): kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang // 
163b1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang
163b2(nyi khri): ma mchis ste/ 'di ni gzugs so// 'di ni tshor ba'o// do ni 'du shes so// 'di ni 'du byed do// 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o// 'di ni skye mched do// 'di ni khams so// 
163b3(nyi khri): 'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o// 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad do// 'di ni stong pa nyid thams cad do// 'di ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun no// 
163b4(nyi khri): 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// 'di ni bsam gtan rnams so// 'di ni tshad med pa rnams so// / 'di ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// 
163b5(nyi khri): 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do// 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o// 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / 
163b6(nyi khri): smon pa med pa'o// 'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams so// 'di ni ting 'dzin rnams so// 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o// 
163b7(nyi khri): 'di ni mo 'jigs pa bzhi'o// 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'o// 'di ni byams pa chen po'o// 'di ni snying rje chen po'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
163b8(nyi khri): brgyad do// 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ro zhes bgyi ba'i rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de
164a1(nyi khri): bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ gzugs kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
164a2(nyi khri): shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do// pha rol
164a3(nyi khri): tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams
164a4(nyi khri): dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
164a5(nyi khri): pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting 'dzin rnams dang / 
164a6(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen
164a7(nyi khri): po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa
164a8(nyi khri): gang yang med do// 'di ni gzugs so// 'di ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'o// 'di ni skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel
164b1(nyi khri): bar 'byung ba'o// 'don pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad do// 'don stong pa nyid thams cad do// 'di ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun no// 'di ni 'phags pa'i
164b2(nyi khri): bden pa rnams so// 'di ni bsam gtan rnams so// 'di ni tshad med pa rnams so// 'di ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// 'di ni rnam par thar
164b3(nyi khri): ba brgyad do// 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o// 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// / 
164b4(nyi khri): 'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams so// 'di ni to 'dzin rnams so// 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo rnam so// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o// / 
164b5(nyi khri): 'di na mi 'jigs pa bzhi'o// 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'o// 'di ni byams pa chen po'o// 'di ni snying rje chen po'o// / 'di ni sangs rgyas
164b6(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad do// 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ro zhes bya bar rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
164b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po rnams chos de ltar zhi ba dag la rtog kyang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing bdag gis chos de dag ni 'di ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya'o// bla na
164b8(nyi khri): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'di ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos de ltar zhi ba dang / de ltar bzang ba de dag bshad par bya'o// snyam du
165a1(nyi khri): sems pa na dka' ba byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
165a2(nyi khri): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi dpung gnyen du gyur pa yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bla na med pa yang dag
165a3(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi gling du gyur pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na chu klung ngam/ chu bran nam/ 
165a4(nyi khri): rgya mtsho chen po'i nong na chus yongasu bcad pa'i gnas gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag ni gling zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / 
165a5(nyi khri): ma'i mtha' yongasu chad pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ldanamatha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongasu chad pa'o// skye
165a6(nyi khri): mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongasu chad pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i
165a7(nyi khri): mtha' yongasasu chad pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
165a8(nyi khri): dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na sngon gyi mnga' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongasu chad pa'o// nang stong pa nyid dang / byi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mnga'ang
165b1(nyi khri): phyi ma'i mtha' yongasu chad pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongasu chad pa'o// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa
165b2(nyi khri): bdun ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongasu chad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i
165b3(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
165b4(nyi khri): dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / 
165b5(nyi khri): 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnam sa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha'
165b6(nyi khri): dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongasu chad pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongasu chad pa'o// rab 'byor sngon gyi mtha' dang / 
165b7(nyi khri): phyi ma'i mtha' yongasu chad pa 'dis/ chos thams cad yongasu chad pa ste/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongasu chad pa gang yin pa de ni ni
165b8(nyi khri): ba'o// de ni bzang po'o// de ni yang dag pa ste/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid dang / dmig su med pa dang / lam gyi rgyun chad pa dang / sred pa zad pa dang / 'dre ba med pa dang / 'dod
166a1(nyi khri): chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang / 
166a2(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de ltar zhi ba dang / de ltar bzang po'i chos de dag ston te/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
166a3(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can gyi gling du gyur pa yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na
166a4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na me du pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi snang bar gyur
166a5(nyi khri): pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dang / 'a sems dpa' chen po yun ring du ma rig pa'i/ sgo nga'i sbubs kyi rab rib kyis kun nas 'khris shing // 
166a6(nyi khri): mun pas zil gyis non pa'i sems can rnams la/ shos rab kyis snang bar byed cing / gti mug mun pa dang / ma rig pa'i mun nag dang / mi shes pa'i rab rib sel te/ 
166a7(nyi khri): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi snang
166a8(nyi khri): bar gyur pa yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
166b1(nyi khri): nas/ sems can rnams kyi sgron ma 'dzin cing 'od 'byin pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
166b2(nyi khri): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ mdo sde pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa/ byin gyis brlabs bzhi dang ldan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang ldan pa de
166b3(nyi khri): dag gi don ma nor bar sems can rnams la yang dag par ston te/ sems can rnams kyang de la yang dag par bskul zhing kun tu sbyor la/ gzhog cing rab tu 'god de/ 
166b4(nyi khri): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 
166b5(nyi khri): sems can rnams kyi sgron ma 'dzin cing 'od 'byin pa yin no// ra ba 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
166b6(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams kyi ded dpon du gyur pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
166b7(nyi khri): po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can lam ngan par zhugs shing tshul ma yin pa bzhi la zhen pa rnams la/ 
166b8(nyi khri): sems can rnam par dag par bya ba'i don du/ mya ngan dang / gnod pa las yang dag par bzla ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba nub par bya ba dang / rigs pa dang
167a1(nyi khri): ldan pa'i chos go bar bya ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir/ gcig la brten pa'i lam ston te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
167a2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams kyi ded dpon du gyur pa yin no// 
167a3(nyi khri): rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can
167a4(nyi khri): rnams kyi yongasu 'dren par gyur pa yin zhe na/ rab 'a byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ ngan po// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
167a5(nyi khri): tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ gzugs/ skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i
167a6(nyi khri): phyir chos ston to// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam
167a7(nyi khri): bar byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa
167a8(nyi khri): med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par
167b1(nyi khri): byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi/ 
167b2(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir
167b3(nyi khri): chos ston to nang stong pa nyid skye ba med pa dang / 'gags pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to// dngos po
167b4(nyi khri): med pa'i ngo bye nyid kyi bar du skye ba med pa dang / 'gag/ rapa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to// dran pa nye
167b5(nyi khri): bar gzhag po rnams skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med/ pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to// 'phags
167b6(nyi khri): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to// 
167b7(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa
167b8(nyi khri): brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon
168a1(nyi khri): par shes pa rnams dang / ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so
168a2(nyi khri): so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun
168a3(nyi khri): nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med
168a4(nyi khri): ba dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong pa'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub
168a5(nyi khri): dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi/ bar du skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba
168a6(nyi khri): med pa'i phyir chos ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
168a7(nyi khri): par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams kyi yongasu 'dren par gyur pa yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bla na med pa yang
168a8(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams kyi lam du gyur pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
168b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ gzugs ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can
168b2(nyi khri): rnams la chos ston to// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni na mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to// skye
168b3(nyi khri): mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni/ na mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / 
168b4(nyi khri): stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su ma cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / 
168b5(nyi khri): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gan/ nyes pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar
168b6(nyi khri): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs
168b7(nyi khri): ba'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
168b8(nyi khri): pa bco brgyad ni na mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid kyi bar du na mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can/ 
169a1(nyi khri): rnams la chos ston to// gzugs kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ don ma 'gra ma 'ang zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chas stan ta/ 
169a2(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mo 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to// 
169a3(nyi khri): skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro ma 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to// 
169a4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams ca/ da dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsadabadun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bas
169a5(nyi khri): gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas par
169a6(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting 'dzin
169a7(nyi khri): rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen
169a8(nyi khri): po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro ma 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos
169b1(nyi khri): ston to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro ma 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor de
169b2(nyi khri): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams kyi
169b3(nyi khri): lam du gyur pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
169b4(nyi khri): stong pa nyid la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so// darab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// / 
169b5(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtshan ma med pa la 'gro ba 'ama'o// ba mi dmigaso// rab 'byor chos thams cadani smon pa med pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul
169b6(nyi khri): de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ smon pa med pa la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngang tshul can
169b7(nyi khri): te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams cad mi skye ma
169b8(nyi khri): 'gag pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi skye mi 'gag pa la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigaso// rab 'byor chos thams
170a1(nyi khri): cad ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
170a2(nyi khri): kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigaso// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rmi lam gyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag
170a3(nyi khri): ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rmi lam la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sgyu ma'i ngang tshul can te/ 
170a4(nyi khri): de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir/ zhe na/ sgyu ma la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigaso// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sgra brnyan gyi ngang tshul
170a5(nyi khri): can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgra brnyan la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigaso// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mig
170a6(nyi khri): yor gyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig yor la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigaso// rab 'byor chos thams cad
170a7(nyi khri): ni gzugs brnyan gyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs brnyan la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigaso// rab 'byor chos thams/ 
170a8(nyi khri): cad ni smig rgyu'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ smig rgyu la 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba mi dmig so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni
170b1(nyi khri): chu zla'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chu zla la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigaso// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sprul pa'i
170b2(nyi khri): ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sprul pa la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigaso// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtha' yas
170b3(nyi khri): kun tu mtha' yas pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigaso// 
170b4(nyi khri): rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'byung ba dang / mi 'a/ byung ba med pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbyung
170b5(nyi khri): ba dang mi dbyung ba med pa la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dam gso// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dbri ba dang / bsnan pa med pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang
170b6(nyi khri): tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbri ba dang bsnun pa med pa la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigaso// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'ong ba med pa'i ngang tshul can te// 
170b7(nyi khri): de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'ong ba med pa la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigaso// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni blang ba dang / der ba med pa'i
170b8(nyi khri): ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blang ba dang dor ba med pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams
171a1(nyi khri): cad na phreng ba med pa dang / 'brel ba med pa dang / 'dre ba med pa dang / ma 'dre ba med pa'i nga tshul can te/ de dag na ngang tshul nga las mi 'da'
171a2(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phrad pa med pa dang / 'brel pa med pa dang / 'dra ba med pa dang / mi 'dre ba med pa la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams cad na/ 
171a3(nyi khri): bdag gi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bdag nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab
171a4(nyi khri): 'byor chos thams cad ni sems can dang srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag/ dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / 
171a5(nyi khri): byed du 'jug pa dang / slong ba po dang / yongasu slong ba po dang / tshor ba po dang / tshor bar byed pa po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i ngang tshul can te/ 
171a6(nyi khri): de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mthong ba nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni
171a7(nyi khri): rtag pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rtag pa nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ 
171a8(nyi khri): rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bde ba dang bdag dang / sdug pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sdug pa nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la
171b1(nyi khri): 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mi
171b2(nyi khri): rtag pa nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa'i ngang tshul
171b3(nyi khri): can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mi sdug pa nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos
171b4(nyi khri): thams cad ni 'dod chags kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'dod chags kyi dngos po nyid kyang shin tu
171b5(nyi khri): med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni zhe sdang gi ngang tshulacan te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i
171b6(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor zhe sdang gi dngos po nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gti mug gi ngang tshul can te// 
171b7(nyi khri): de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gti mug gi dngos po nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos
171b8(nyi khri): thams cad ni lte ba'i rnam pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lta ba'i rnam pa'i dngos po nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro/ 
172a1(nyi khri): pa'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na// 
172a2(nyi khri): rab 'byor de bzhin nyid la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / bsam gyis
172a3(nyi khri): mi khyab pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod// 
172a4(nyi khri): rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mi g.yo ba'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o//  de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos gang la yang g.yo ba med de/ 'gro
172a5(nyi khri): ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos tham sa cad ni gzugs kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni dang / tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
172a6(nyi khri): gzugs nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i
172a7(nyi khri): ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab
172a8(nyi khri): 'byor chos thams cad ni smyon pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngang tshul te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang
172b1(nyi khri): shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi
172b2(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
172b3(nyi khri): rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni nang stong pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/ 
172b4(nyi khri): de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid kyang shin tu mi dmigs na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor
172b5(nyi khri): chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa/ nyid kyi bar gyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos
172b6(nyi khri): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag
172b7(nyi khri): ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang shin tu mi dmigs na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos
172b8(nyi khri): thams cad ni yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi ngang tshul te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// / 
173a1(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na// rab 'byor lam nyid kyang shin tu mi dmigs na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'phags
173a2(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
173a3(nyi khri): pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin
173a4(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
173a5(nyi khri): 'dres pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byorasangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang shin tu mi
173a6(nyi khri): dmigs na de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// 
173a7(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang shin tu mi dmigs na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni lan cig/ 
173a8(nyi khri): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i
173b1(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rang byang chub nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
173b2(nyi khri): chub kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nyid kyang shin tu mi dmigs
173b3(nyi khri): na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigaso// gsol ba bcom ldan 'das de ltar zab pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las su zhig mos par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
173b4(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / bla na med pa yang dag parardzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan
173b5(nyi khri): 'das rnams kyi drung du spyad par gyur pa/ dge ba'i rtsa/ kha yongasu smin pa/ sangs rgyas mang po bsnyen bku/ ra ba/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu bzung ba
173b6(nyi khri): de dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u sum cu drug pa'o// / 
173b7(nyi khri): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ba de dag gis rang bzhin ji lta bu
173b8(nyi khri): zhig tu 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi ngang tshul can dang / mtshan ma dang / rnam pa ji lta bu zhig du 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ 
174a1(nyi khri): pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dil mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni/ 'dod chags
174a2(nyi khri): rnam par gsal bas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnam par bsal bas dben pa'i rang bzhin
174a3(nyi khri): du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'dod chags kyi tshul gyis dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
174a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi chu dal gyis dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// rab 'a byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni
174a5(nyi khri): 'dod chags kyi mtshan mas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mtshan mas
174a6(nyi khri): dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'dod chags kyi rnam par dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
174a7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi rnam par dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
174a8(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo yongasu 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag gi ngang tshul ji lta bur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
174b1(nyi khri): stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongasu shes par gyur pa de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
174b2(nyi khri): nyid kyi ngang tshul du 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul te/ sems
174b3(nyi khri): can rnams kyi rten du 'gyur ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
174b4(nyi khri): chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can/ sems can rnams kyi rten du gyur pa de yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub
174b5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sems ca na thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'di 'tshal kyang / de la sems can dang // 
174b6(nyi khri): sems can du gdags pa mi dmigs pa de dag ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 
174b7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis/ sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'di bgos pa de dag ni dka' ba byed pa'o// / 
174b8(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzug kyang shin tu med na/ byang chub sems dpa'i
175a1(nyi khri): go cha yang med pas de'i phyir go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go
175a2(nyi khri): chad ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa yang shin tu med
175a3(nyi khri): la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam par shes pa dang / 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
175a4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang 'brel pa ma ra yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rten cing 'brel
175a5(nyi khri): par 'byung ba yang shin tu med la/ byang chub sem/ sa dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes
175a6(nyi khri): bya'o// rab 'byor go cha de ni bdag dang 'brel pa ma yin/ sems can dang 'brel pa ma yin/ srog dang 'brel pa ma yin/ skye ba dang 'brel pa ma yin/ gso ba dang
175a7(nyi khri): 'brel pa ma yin/ skyes bu dang 'brel pa ma yin/ gang zag dang 'brel pa ma yin/ shed can dang 'brel pa ma yin/ shed bdag dang 'brel pa ma yin/ byed pa po dang
175a8(nyi khri): 'brel pa ma yin/ tshor ba po dang 'brel pa ma yin/ shes pa po dang 'brel pa ma yin/ mthong ba po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mthong ba
175b1(nyi khri): bo yang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni mthong ba po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
175b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i go cha da ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang shin tu med la/ 
175b3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
175b4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu// phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan
175b5(nyi khri): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa mi yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang shin tu
175b6(nyi khri): med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub
175b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ nang stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la byang chub
175b8(nyi khri): sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni nang stong pa nyid dang 'brel par yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni
176a1(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang
176a2(nyi khri): shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas de'i phyir go cha de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byung
176a3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha da ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yang shin
176a4(nyi khri): tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dran pa nye bar ga/ zhag pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor
176a5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'igo cha de ni/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phru/ la gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / 
176a6(nyi khri): byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yon lag brgyad pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zho na/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
176a7(nyi khri): pa yang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// 
176a8(nyi khri): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
176b1(nyi khri): 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de ci'i phyir go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'brel
176b2(nyi khri): pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa gang dag sems can thams cad
176b3(nyi khri): bdag cag gis yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha bgos pa de dag gi go cha de ni chos thams cad dang 'brel pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang
176b4(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems ca na thams cad yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// zhes go cha 'tshal ba des/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ 
176b5(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyi su dogs par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das sems can tham/ sa cad yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha
176b6(nyi khri): 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'o gnas dang skabs ma mchis te/ de ni gnas ma mchiso// 
176b7(nyi khri): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa mtshams bcad te/ sems can gyi don du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis// 
176b8(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyis don gyi dbang gang zhig mthong na/ de skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha dgos shing / shes rab
177a1(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa des nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs par mi bya'o zhes smras/ gsol/ 
177a2(nyi khri): pa bcom ldan 'das de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can nyi tshe nyung zad cig gi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags/ ye shes cung zad nyi tshe zhig gi slad du/ 
177a3(nyi khri): go cha 'tshal ba ma lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sems can thams cad yongasu mya ngan las bzla
177a4(nyi khri): ba'i slad du go cha 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni rnam rab thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi slad du go cha 'tshal
177a5(nyi khri): to/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub/ sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can
177a6(nyi khri): nyung zad nyi tshe'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin/ ye shes cung zad nyi tshe'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni// 
177a7(nyi khri): sems can thams cad yongasu mya ngan las bzla ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi don du go cha bgos so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu
177a8(nyi khri): byin pa 'di ni shin tu zab pa ste/ de ni sus kyang bsgom par mi bgyi ci yang bsgom par mi bgyi/ gang du yang bsgom par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
177b1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gang bsgom pa 'am/ gang bsgom par bgyi ba 'am/ gang gis bsgom par bgyi ba'i chos gang yang yongasu grub pa dmigs su
177b2(nyi khri): ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni na mkha' bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
177b3(nyi khri): bsgom pa de ni/ chos thams cad bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan
177b4(nyi khri): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgo dam pa de ni/ yongasu 'dzin pa ma mchis pa bsgom ba'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
177b5(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
177b6(nyi khri): phyin pa bsgom pa de gang bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa yin gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ gzugs sgom pa
177b7(nyi khri): rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bsgom
177b8(nyi khri): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bsgom
178a1(nyi khri): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 
178a2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / 
178a3(nyi khri): shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
178a4(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sbyin pa'i pha ro/ la tu byin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// dbacom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
178a5(nyi khri): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
178a6(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
178a7(nyi khri): bsgom pa 'di ni/ nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dngos po med pa'i
178a8(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag
178b1(nyi khri): ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang
178b2(nyi khri): bo dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di na// 
178b3(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad
178b4(nyi khri): dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma me dad pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa
178b5(nyi khri): rnams dang / ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgra rnam sa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
178b6(nyi khri): bsgom pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs
178b7(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
178b8(nyi khri): bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i
179a1(nyi khri): 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub bsgom pa rnam par brnam pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
179a2(nyi khri): phyin pa bsgom pa 'don/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de
179a3(nyi khri): bzhin te/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
179a4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ 
179a5(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skye mchod dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung babasgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'ad
179a6(nyi khri): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni// sems
179a7(nyi khri): can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shod bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tsher ba po dang / shes pa po dang / 
179a8(nyi khri): mthong ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
179b1(nyi khri): pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'ang ni/ stong pa nyid thams cad bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byur 'di lta ste/ shes rab
179b2(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ byang chub kyi phyog kyi chos rnams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 
179b3(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
179b4(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / gzungs
179b5(nyi khri): kyi sgo bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'adi ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 
179b6(nyi khri): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom pa
179b7(nyi khri): rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
179b8(nyi khri): pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
180a1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir mi ldog pa'i
180a2(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
180a3(nyi khri): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam
180a4(nyi khri): zhes/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
180a5(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongasu brtags par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
180a6(nyi khri): chen po nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ dngos po
180a7(nyi khri): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongasu brtag par bya'o// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mngon par chags pa
180a8(nyi khri): med dam zhes/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongasu brtag par bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan
180b1(nyi khri): dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo
180b2(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes// 
180b3(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongasu brtag par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang // 
180b4(nyi khri): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mngon par chags pa med
180b5(nyi khri): dam zhes/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongasu brtag par bya'o// rnam pa thams cad
180b6(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongasu brtag par bya'o// / 
180b7(nyi khri): phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol gyis smras pa dang / pha rol gyis bstan
180b8(nyi khri): pa la snying por mi lta 'am/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol gyis dad pas mi
181a1(nyi khri): 'gro ba 'am/ phyir mo ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'ad la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod chags
181a2(nyi khri): dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang / gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems skyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ phyir mi ldog
181a3(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ 
181a4(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bdam gyur tam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
181a5(nyi khri): dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ zhes
181a6(nyi khri): yong su brtag par bya ste/ gal te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi dngang
181a7(nyi khri): skrag par mi 'gyur la/ zhum pa dang / yongs su zhum pa mi 'gyur zhing / de'i yid phyir nur bar mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par dka' la/ 
181a8(nyi khri): thos nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang la/ klog cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
181b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po des ni/ sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongasu dris shing / yongasu brtag pa byas pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs te/ 
181b2(nyi khri): kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
181b3(nyi khri): po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi de dang skrag par mi 'gyur la zhum par mi 'gyur/ yongasu zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / de'i
181b4(nyi khri): yid phyir mi ldog la/ thos nas kyang khong du chud cing 'chang la/ klog cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i phyir ro gsol pa/ 
181b5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par
181b6(nyi khri): mi 'gyur zhing / zhum par mi 'gyur/ yongasu zhum par mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ shes rab kyi pha rol
181b7(nyi khri): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ji ltar brtag par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ rnam pa thams
181b8(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtog par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam pa thams
182a1(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtogs pa
182a2(nyi khri): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
182a3(nyi khri): bzab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / skye ba med pa
182a4(nyi khri): dang / 'gag pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par bya/ rab med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / de bzhin nyid la
182a5(nyi khri): gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la gan la ba'i bsam pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
182a6(nyi khri): dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
182a7(nyi khri): zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rmi lam dang gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / sgra brnyan dang / smig rgyu dang / sgyu ma dang / sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ 
182a8(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin no// // shes rab kyi pha rol
182b1(nyi khri): tu byin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa// bam po ni dgu pa// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
182b2(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur zhing / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis dang / na mkha' ma mchis pa dang / skye ba ma
182b3(nyi khri): mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / 
182b4(nyi khri): yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / mngon par 'du ba dgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / rmi lam dang / gzugs brnyan
182b5(nyi khri): dang / sgra brnyan dang / smig rgyu dang / sgyu ma dang / sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur na/ bcom ldan
182b6(nyi khri): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rtogs pa lags sam/ skye
182b7(nyi khri): mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rtog pa lags sam/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs
182b8(nyi khri): kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la rtog pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
183a1(nyi khri): par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / 
183a2(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs
183a3(nyi khri): pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
183a4(nyi khri): pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rtog pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub
183a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzugs la rtog/ pa ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang // 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin// 
183a6(nyi khri): skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la ma rtog pa ma yin no// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs
183a7(nyi khri): kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la rtog pa ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
183a8(nyi khri): par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
183b1(nyi khri): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs
183b2(nyi khri): pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
183b3(nyi khri): 'dres pa rnams rnam par rtogs pa ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rtog pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams
183b4(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sus kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang du ya dang ma song / phyogs na yang mi gnas/ yul na yang mi
183b5(nyi khri): gnas/ gang na yang mi gnas pa ste/ de la grangs mi dmigaso// 'gro ba dang 'ong ba yang mi dmigs// gang la grangs mi dmigs shing 'gro ba dang 'ong ba mi
183b6(nyi khri): dmigs pa de ni/ gang gis kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par mi nus te/ gzugs kyis ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par/ 
183b7(nyi khri): shes pas ma yin no// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas ma yino// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang // 
183b8(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no// nang stong pa nyi
184a1(nyi khri): kyis ma yin no// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis ma yin no// yang dag par
184a2(nyi khri): spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad/ 
184a3(nyi khri): bas ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// tshor ba nyid
184a4(nyi khri): dang / 'du shes nyid dang / 'du byed nyid dang / rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
184a5(nyi khri): bco brgyad kyi bar yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
184a6(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
184a7(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
184a8(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang
184b1(nyi khri): yin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / 
184b2(nyi khri): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / 
184b3(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
184b4(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni// de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang
184b5(nyi khri): dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying / rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco/ brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
184b6(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u sum cu bdun pa'o// / 
184b7(nyi khri): de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ud pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mo da dang / pun da ri ka mang po khyer
184b8(nyi khri): te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de log su 'thor bar gyur to// gtor nas bcom ldan 'das ga la der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ 
185a1(nyi khri): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'khod nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
185a2(nyi khri): to/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las 'di skad du
185a3(nyi khri): gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugaso// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nyid
185a4(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyengan pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid// 
185a5(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cadamakhyen pa nyid kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid/ rnam pa thams cad
185a6(nyi khri): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi/ 
185a7(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
185a8(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang / nang stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
185b1(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
185b2(nyi khri): ba ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phru ni rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
185b3(nyi khri): dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags
185b4(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pathams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
185b5(nyi khri): nyid kyang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o// rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i sku mas par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
185b6(nyi khri): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs
185b7(nyi khri): pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
185b8(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin/ 
186a1(nyi khri): ba de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyisu byar med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i
186a2(nyi khri): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste gnyisu med cing gnyisu byar med do// skye/ 
186a3(nyi khri): mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin
186a4(nyi khri): nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar me// da do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
186a5(nyi khri): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
186a6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 
186a7(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis su byar med do// nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin// 
186a8(nyi khri): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyisu byar med do// 
186b1(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig/ 
186b2(nyi khri): pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
186b3(nyi khri): pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyisu byar med do// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang // 
186b4(nyi khri): byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang / 
186b5(nyi khri): yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu med cing gnyis su byer med do// 'phags pa'i ba den pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / 
186b6(nyi khri): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste// 
186b7(nyi khri): gnyi su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
186b8(nyi khri): med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang
187a1(nyi khri): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid gang
187a2(nyi khri): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyisu byar med do// rgyun du zhugs
187a3(nyi khri): pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
187a4(nyi khri): dang / sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /  rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ 
187a5(nyi khri): gnyisu med cing gnyis su byar med do// zhes ston pa ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zab cing
187a6(nyi khri): blta dka' la khong du chud par dka' zhing brtag tu ma mchis la/ rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa ste/ zhi zhing phra ba zhib mo mkhas shing rtogs pas rig par bgyi ba ste/ 
187a7(nyi khri): 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad
187a8(nyi khri): ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so// / 
187b1(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// 
187b2(nyi khri): skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o// / 
187b3(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
187b4(nyi khri): phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
187b5(nyi khri): tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams
187b6(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
187b7(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ 
187b8(nyi khri): ba nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags
188a1(nyi khri): ba'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 
188a2(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad// 
188a3(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o// rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
188a4(nyi khri): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / tingange 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / 
188a5(nyi khri): mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams
188a6(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa
188a7(nyi khri): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu med cing gnyis su byar med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam
188a8(nyi khri): bar shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis su
188b1(nyi khri): byar med do// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
188b2(nyi khri): yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyisu byar med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
188b3(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis su byar med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
188b4(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyipha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de
188b5(nyi khri): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing
188b6(nyi khri): gnyisu byar med do// nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ 
188b7(nyi khri): gnyis su med cing gnyis byar med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
188b8(nyi khri): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar med do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
189a1(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig paste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 
189a2(nyi khri): yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stabs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i dang
189a3(nyi khri): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 
189a4(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa ra 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 
189a5(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis byar med do// rnam par thar
189a6(nyi khri): pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes
189a7(nyi khri): ba dang / ting 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang
189a8(nyi khri): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin
189b1(nyi khri): nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / 
189b2(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
189b3(nyi khri): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis byar med do// lha'i bu dag don gyi dbang de gzigs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
189b4(nyi khri): phrin las chung ba la thugs gzhol te/ chos bstan pa la gzhol ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ji lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos
189b5(nyi khri): byang chub 'di ni zab cing blta dka' la/ khong du chud paradaka' zhing rtag du med la/ rtog ge'i spyod yul ma/ yin te/ zhi zhing phra ba zhib mo mkhas shing
189b6(nyi khri): rtogs pas rig par bya ba 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba ste/ de ni sus kyang mngon par sangs ma rgyas/ nam yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas/ gar
189b7(nyi khri): yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas te/ gang la gnyis su kun nas rgyu ba med pa de ni/ chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid do// lha'i bu dag na mkha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// 
189b8(nyi khri): lha'i bu dag de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag chos kyi dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa'i phyir/ 
190a1(nyi khri): chos 'di bab bo// lha'i bu dag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di bab bo// lha'i bu dag mtha' yas su med pa'i phyir
190a2(nyi khri): chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag mi skye mi 'gag pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med
190a3(nyi khri): pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di
190a4(nyi khri): zab bo// lha'i bu dag mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag bdog zab pa'i
190a5(nyi khri): phyir chos 'di zab bo// sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag da shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba
190a6(nyi khri): po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / 
190a7(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag
190a8(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pad
190b1(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di rab bo// nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// dngos po med
190b2(nyi khri): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
190b3(nyi khri): rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag 'phags
